Every part of education is a step towards a fulfilling career through lucrative employment. The main goal of the SVU Training and Placement Cell is to bridge the academia-industry gap by providing every additional guidance required for you to cover the distance from a being student to becoming a professional in your respective fields. Our role is to coach you beyond the ambit of academics to nurture you into becoming the most eligible candidate for your dream career trajectory. We achieve this feat by equipping you with complementary industrial skills relevant to your field. While our uniquely designed academic courses provide you with the best level of insight and knowledge available in the respective academic disciplines, our training and placement cell arm you with the professional etiquette, leadership skills, and industrial expertise required to excel in your field.
The University held its 9th Convocation ceremony on July 21, 2023, where over 200 MBBS and Ph.D. scholars were awarded degrees and medals for their exceptional performance........

course: This online payment system is provided by Shri Venkateshwara University. SVU may update these terms from time to time and any changes will be effective immediately on being set out here. Please ensure you are aware of the current terms. The country of domicile for SVU is India.

Please read these terms carefully before using the online payment facility. Using the online payment facility on this website indicates that you accept these terms. If you do not accept these terms do not use this facility. The description of services of match making are specific to your need, when you log in with your unique password. Normally payment is required in advance (i.e. before you commence your activity).
All Fees quoted are in Indian Rupees. International Payments can also be collected through online mode. The SVU reserves the right to change the fees at any time.
Your payment will normally reach the SVU account to which you are making a payment within two working days.

We cannot accept liability for a payment not reaching the correct SVU account due to you quoting an incorrect account number or incorrect personal details. Neither can we accept liability if payment is refused or declined by the credit/debit card supplier for any reason.

If the card supplier declines payment the SVU is under no obligation to bring this fact to your attention. You should check with your bank/credit/debit card supplier that payment has been deducted from your account.

In no event will the SVU be liable for any damages whatsoever arising out of the use, inability to use, or the results of use of this site, any websites linked to this site, or the materials or information contained at any or all such sites, whether based on warranty, contract, tort or any other legal theory and whether or not advised of the possibility of such damages.
If the Customer leaves the SVU before they complete their service period, there shall be no entitlement to a refund of paid service fees.

Refunds, if applicable, at the discretion of the Management, will only be made to the debit/credit card used for the original transaction. For the avoidance of doubt nothing in this Policy shall require the SVU to refund the Fees (or part thereof) unless such Fees (or part thereof) have previously been paid.

This Privacy Policy applies to all of the products, services and websites offered by SVU. Sometimes, we may post product specific privacy notices or Help Centre materials to explain our products in more detail. If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please feel free to contact us through our website or write to us Information we collect and how we use it for our SVU.

SVU reserves the entire right to modify/amend/remove this privacy statement anytime and without any reason. Nothing contained herein creates or is intended to create a contract/agreement between SVU and any user visiting the SVU website or providing identifying information of any kind.
If you wish to stop any further sms/email alerts/contacts from our side, all you need to do is to send an email:-  with your mobile numbers and you will be excluded from the alerts list.
All cancellations should go through SVU Policy.

Department/School: SVU promotes collaborative research because such research will benefit all stakeholders. Hence, we have partnered with leading private & government agencies for pursuing sponsored research because this way we can benefit the society at large.
Because of our research facilities, SVU have received grants from entities for undertaking collaborative research in key areas.

The faculty at SVU are knowledgeable with years of industry experience because industry experience is crucial for employment. They encourage scholars to achieve their goal by enduring in labs because experimentation leads to discovery.

SVU is concerned about upgrading their faculty therefore, we send them on FDP that empowers them with new skills. We have tie-ups with foreign universities where students can complete half of their semesters.
This way students can transfer credits to a foreign university & accomplish their dream of a foreign degree.
SVU has partnered with CSIR, ICMR, IIS & other institutions of repute because we believe with cooperation, we can achieve better results.
The teaching process at SVU is student centric because we want to promote learning & not rote learning.
Students take part in case studies, projects & activity simulation that instigates critical thinking because it is the most in demand skill.

Department/School: Shri Venkateshwara University (SVU) has a strong stance against ragging, actively working to prevent it and ensure a safe campus environment for all students

Shri Venkateshwara University (SVU) has a vibrant student life with various clubs catering to diverse interests. The Student Club focuses on organizing events like cultural festivals, talent shows, and academic seminars, fostering a sense of community and providing opportunities for students to showcase their talents and develop leadership skills

Shri Venkateshwara University (SVU) is a private university located in Gajraula, Uttar Pradesh, India. The university was established in 2010 through the Shri Venkateshwara University Uttar Pradesh Act, 2010 as a venture of the Venkateshwara Group of Institutions.

developer_info.name: Sameer Malik
developer_info.about: Sameer Malik is a passionate Full Stack Developer with expertise in MERN Stack and Python. He has built multiple projects integrating AI, real-time applications, and efficient backend systems. He loves building fast, scalable, and user-friendly web applications. For collaborations, reach out to him via email or visit his portfolio.
